mapper.select:
SELECT T2.CODE_MASTER_ID AS mstId , T1.CODE_MASTER_NAME AS mstNm, T2.CODE_ID AS cdId, T2.CODE AS cd, T2.CODE_NAME AS cdNm, T2.CODE_DESC AS cdDs FROM SYS0012M T1 JOIN SYS0013M T2 ON T1.CODE_MASTER_ID = T2.CODE_MASTER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND T1.CODE_MASTER_ID = #{mstId} AND T2.CODE_ID IN (1,2,3)
ORDER BY T2.CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMM0041C ( ORG_GR_CD, ORG_CD, ORG_SEQ, ORG_GR_NM, ORG_NM, USE_YN, START_YEARMONTH, END_YEARMONTH, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{orgGrCd}, #{orgCd}, CMM0041C_ORG_SEQ.nextval , #{orgGrNm}, #{orgNm}, #{useYn}, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL), #{endDt}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ORG_GR_CD, ORG_CD, ORG_SEQ FROM CMM0041C WHERE END_YEARMONTH=#{endDt} AND ORG_GR_CD=#{orgGrCd} AND ORG_CD=#{orgCd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CMM0041C WHERE ORG_GR_CD=#{orgGrCd} AND ORG_CD=#{orgCd} AND ORG_SEQ=#{orgSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT ORG_GR_CD , ORG_GR_NM FROM CMM0041C WHERE 1=1 AND START_YEARMONTH < END_YEARMONTH
AND USE_YN = #{useYnCombo}
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN START_YEARMONTH AND END_YEARMONTH
GROUP BY ORG_GR_CD, ORG_GR_NM

SELECT T1.ORG_SEQ , T1.ORG_GR_CD , T1.ORG_CD , T1.ORG_NM , T2.CODE_DESC AS cdDs , T2.CODE FROM CMM0041C T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M T2 ON T1.ORG_CD = T2.CODE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') BETWEEN T1.START_YEARMONTH AND T1.END_YEARMONTH ORDER BY T1.ORG_GR_CD,T1.ORG_NM

SELECT T1.CODE_MASTER_ID , T2.CODE_ID , T2.CODE , T2.CODE_NAME , T2.CODE_DESC AS cdDs FROM SYS0012M T1 JOIN SYS0013M T2 ON T1.CODE_MASTER_ID = T2.CODE_MASTER_ID AND T2.DISAB = '0' WHERE 1=1
AND T1.CODE_MASTER_ID=#{mstId}
AND T2.CODE LIKE #{ItemOrgCd} ||'%'
ORDER BY T2.CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMM0042C ( ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, ORG_SEQ, ITEM_NM, ORG_GR_CD, ORG_CD, TYPE_CD, USE_YN, ITEM_DESC, START_YEARMONTH, END_YEARMONTH, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( CMM0042C_ITEM_SEQ.nextval, #{itemCd}, #{orgSeq}, #{itemNm}, #{orgGrCd}, #{orgCd}, #{typeCd}, #{useYn}, #{cdDs}, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL), #{endDt}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT RULE_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, RULE_LEVEL, RULE_PID FROM CMM0043M WHERE ITEM_SEQ=#{itemSeq} AND ITEM_CD=#{itemCd} AND RULE_SEQ=#{ruleSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMM0043M ( RULE_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, RULE_LEVEL, RULE_PID, RULE_NM, RULE_CATEGORY, RULE_OPT1, RULE_OPT2, VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_TYPE_NM, RESULT_VALUE, RESULT_VALUE_NM, RULE_DESC, START_YEARMONTH, END_YEARMONTH, USE_YN, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, PRT_ORDER ) VALUES ( CMM0043M_RULE_SEQ.nextval, #{itemSeq}, #{itemCd}, #{ruleLevel}, #{rulePid}, #{ruleNm}, #{ruleCategory}, #{ruleOpt1}, #{ruleOpt2}, #{valueType}, #{valueTypeNm}, #{resultValue}, #{resultValueNm}, #{ruleDesc}, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL), #{endDt}, #{useYn}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId}, SYSDATE, #{printOrder} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CMM0043M SET RULE_NM= #{ruleNm}, RULE_CATEGORY = #{ruleCategory}, VALUE_TYPE = #{valueType}, VALUE_TYPE_NM = #{valueTypeNm}, RESULT_VALUE_NM = #{resultValueNm}, PRT_ORDER = #{printOrder}, RULE_DESC = #{ruleDesc}, USE_YN = #{useYn} WHERE RULE_SEQ=#{ruleSeq} AND RULE_OPT1=#{ruleOpt1} AND RULE_OPT2=#{ruleOpt2} AND RESULT_VALUE=#{resultValue}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID,CODE,CODE_NAME,CODE_DESC FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID=#{mstId} AND DISAB=0 ORDER BY CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMM0055M ( SEQ, YEAR, MONTH, WEEKS, START_DT, END_DT, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( CMM0055M_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{year}, #{month}, #{weeks}, TO_DATE(#{startDt},'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDt},'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CMM0055M T0 USING (SELECT #{year} AS YEAR , #{month} AS MONTH , #{weeks} AS WEEKS FROM DUAL)T1 ON ( T0.YEAR = T1.YEAR AND T0.MONTH = T1.MONTH AND T0.WEEKS = T1.WEEKS) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET START_DT= TO_DATE(#{startDt},'YYYY/MM/DD') , END_DT= TO_DATE(#{endDt},'YYYY/MM/DD') , UPD_USER_ID=#{updUserId} , UPD_DT=SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SEQ, YEAR, MONTH, WEEKS, START_DT, END_DT, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT ) VALUES ( CMM0055M_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{year}, #{month}, #{weeks}, TO_DATE(#{startDt},'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDt},'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ITEM_SEQ) FROM CMM0042T WHERE ITEM_CD= #{itemCd} AND END_YEARMONTH='999999'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMM0042T ( ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, ORG_SEQ, ITEM_NM, ORG_GR_CD, ORG_CD, TYPE_CD, USE_YN, ITEM_DESC, START_YEARMONTH, END_YEARMONTH, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( CMM0042T_ITEM_SEQ.nextval, #{itemCd}, #{orgSeq}, #{itemNm}, #{orgGrCd}, #{orgCd}, #{typeCd}, #{useYn}, #{cdDs}, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL), #{endDt}, #{loginId}, SYSDATE, #{loginId}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO CMM0043T ( RULE_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, RULE_LEVEL, RULE_PID, RULE_NM, RULE_CATEGORY, RULE_OPT1, RULE_OPT2, VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_TYPE_NM, RESULT_VALUE, RESULT_VALUE_NM, RULE_DESC, START_YEARMONTH, END_YEARMONTH, USE_YN, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, PRT_ORDER ) VALUES (
#{ruleSeq},
CMM0043T_RULE_SEQ.nextval,
#{itemSeq}, #{itemCd}, #{ruleLevel}, #{rulePid}, #{ruleNm}, #{ruleCategory}, #{ruleOpt1}, #{ruleOpt2}, #{valueType}, #{valueTypeNm}, #{resultValue}, #{resultValueNm}, #{ruleDesc}, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') FROM DUAL), #{endYearmonth}, #{useYn}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId}, SYSDATE, #{prtOrder} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CMM0043T SET RULE_NM= #{ruleNm}, RULE_CATEGORY = #{ruleCategory}, VALUE_TYPE = #{valueType}, VALUE_TYPE_NM = #{valueTypeNm}, RESULT_VALUE_NM = #{resultValueNm}, PRT_ORDER = #{printOrder}, RULE_DESC = #{ruleDesc}, USE_YN = #{useYn} WHERE RULE_SEQ=#{ruleSeq} AND RULE_OPT1=#{ruleOpt1} AND RULE_OPT2=#{ruleOpt2} AND RESULT_VALUE=#{resultValue}
mapper.select: SELECT RULE_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CD, RULE_LEVEL, RULE_PID FROM CMM0043T WHERE ITEM_SEQ=#{itemSeq} AND ITEM_CD=#{itemCd} AND RULE_SEQ=#{ruleSeq}
